### Welcome!

::: {#intro-heading}
Hi, my name is Erin (she/her). <br>

I graduated from Macalester College in May 2023 as a Statistics major with Computer Science and Economics minors. I am a passionate R user and enjoy using data in an ethical way to solve problems and communicate information. I especially love working in R. I am currently working at Mayo Clinic as a Statistical Programmer. Please check out my [Projects](https://efranke22.github.io/projects.html) tab to learn more about my skills and see examples of my work.  <br>

## About Me

In addition to statistics & data science, I also enjoy marathon training, triathlons, spending time with friends and family, volunteering at my local food pantry in Chicago, hiking, rock climbing, and watching Major League Baseball.
